types.name: ArrayResolution
types.summary: Contains resolved information about an array type.

types.name: BooleanResolution
types.summary: Contains resolved information about a boolean type.

types.name: BooleanResolverCase
types.summary: A type resolver case that matches <see cref="T:System.Boolean" />.

types.name: ByteArrayResolution
types.summary: Contains resolved information about a byte array type.

types.name: ByteArrayResolverCase
types.summary: A type resolver case that matches <see cref="T:System.Byte[]" />.

types.name: ByteResolverCase
types.summary: A type resolver case that matches <see cref="T:System.Byte" />.

types.name: DataContractEnumResolverCase
types.summary:
A type resolver case that matches <see cref="T:System.Enum" /> types, taking
            <see cref="N:System.Runtime.Serialization" /> attributes into account.

types.name: DataContractObjectResolverCase
types.summary:
A general type resolver case that inspects fields and properties, taking
            <see cref="N:System.Runtime.Serialization" /> attributes into account.

types.name: DataContractResolver
types.summary:
A type resolver that extends <see cref="T:Chr.Avro.Resolution.ReflectionResolver" /> with support for
            <see cref="N:System.Runtime.Serialization" /> attributes.

types.name: DataContractResolverCase
types.summary:
An <see cref="T:Chr.Avro.Resolution.ITypeResolverCase" /> that uses <see cref="N:System.Runtime.Serialization" />
            attributes to obtain additional type information.

types.name: DateTimeResolverCase
types.summary: A type resolver case that matches <see cref="T:System.DateTime" /> and <see cref="T:System.DateTimeOffset" />.

types.name: DecimalResolution
types.summary: Contains resolved information about a decimal type.

types.name: DecimalResolverCase
types.summary: A type resolver case that matches <see cref="T:System.Decimal" />.

types.name: DictionaryResolverCase
types.summary: A type resolver case that matches <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{System.Collections.Generic.KeyValuePair`2}" />.

types.name: DoubleResolverCase
types.summary: A type resolver case that matches <see cref="T:System.Double" />.

types.name: DurationResolution
types.summary: Contains resolved information about a duration type.

types.name: EnumerableResolverCase
types.summary: A type resolver case that matches <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1" />.

types.name: EnumResolution
types.summary: Contains resolved information about an enum type.

types.name: EnumResolverCase
types.summary: A type resolver case that matches <see cref="T:System.Enum" /> types.

types.name: EnumUnderlyingTypeResolverCase
types.summary:
A type resolver case that matches <see cref="T:System.Enum" /> types and resolves underlying integral
            types.

types.name: FieldResolution
types.summary: Contains resolved information about a field or property.

types.name: FloatingPointResolution
types.summary: Contains resolved information about an IEEE 754 floating-point number type.

types.name: GuidResolverCase
types.summary: A type resolver case that matches <see cref="T:System.Guid" />.

types.name: IdentifierResolution
types.summary: Contains resolved information about a name.

types.name: Int16ResolverCase
types.summary: A type resolver case that matches <see cref="T:System.Int16" />.

types.name: Int32ResolverCase
types.summary: A type resolver case that matches <see cref="T:System.Int32" />.

types.name: Int64ResolverCase
types.summary: A type resolver case that matches <see cref="T:System.Int64" />.

types.name: IntegerResolution
types.summary: Contains resolved information about an integer type.

types.name: ITypeResolver
types.summary: Resolves .NET type information.

types.name: ITypeResolverCase
types.summary:
Resolves information for specific .NET types. Used by <see cref="T:Chr.Avro.Resolution.TypeResolver" /> to break
            apart resolution logic.

types.name: MapResolution
types.summary: Contains resolved information about a map type.

types.name: NamedTypeResolution
types.summary: Contains resolved information about a named type (i.e., a class, struct, interface, or enum).

types.name: NullableResolverCase
types.summary: A type resolver case that matches <see cref="T:System.Nullable`1" />.

types.name: ObjectResolverCase
types.summary: A general type resolver case that inspects fields and properties.

types.name: RecordResolution
types.summary: Contains resolved information about a record type.

types.name: ReflectionResolver
types.summary:
A type resolver that relies solely on <see cref="T:System.Type" /> methods. Itâ€™s configured with a
            reasonable set of cases that cover most common scenarios.

types.name: ReflectionResolverCase
types.summary: An <see cref="T:Chr.Avro.Resolution.ITypeResolverCase" /> that gets its information from type reflection.

types.name: SByteResolverCase
types.summary: A type resolver case that matches <see cref="T:System.SByte" />.

types.name: SingleResolverCase
types.summary: A type resolver case that matches <see cref="T:System.Single" />.

types.name: StringResolution
types.summary: Contains resolved information about a UTF-8 string type.

types.name: StringResolverCase
types.summary: A type resolver that matches <see cref="T:System.String" />.

types.name: SymbolResolution
types.summary: Contains resolved information about an enum symbol.

types.name: TimeSpanResolverCase
types.summary: A type resolver that matches <see cref="T:System.TimeSpan" />.

types.name: TimestampResolution
types.summary: Contains resolved information about a timestamp type.

types.name: TypeResolution
types.summary: Contains resolved information about a .NET type.

types.name: TypeResolver
types.summary: A customizable type resolver backed by a list of cases.

types.name: TypeResolverCase
types.summary: A base <see cref="T:Chr.Avro.Resolution.ITypeResolverCase" /> implementation.

types.name: UInt16ResolverCase
types.summary: A type resolver case that matches <see cref="T:System.Char" /> and <see cref="T:System.UInt16" />.

types.name: UInt32ResolverCase
types.summary: A type resolver case that matches <see cref="T:System.UInt32" />.

types.name: UInt64ResolverCase
types.summary: A type resolver case that matches <see cref="T:System.UInt64" />.

types.name: UriResolution
types.summary: Contains resolved information about a URI type.

types.name: UriResolverCase
types.summary: A type resolver case that matches <see cref="T:System.Uri" />.

types.name: UuidResolution
types.summary: Contains resolved information about a UUID type.
